languages.text: С тех пор паломники неустанно отправляются на поиски Салис Прайм. Легенда гласит, что прославленная Арджента бродит внутри древнего корабля, ожидая подлинно чистого духом героя, которому передаст Единственную звезду, и разя беспощадно тех, в чьей душе увидит хоть толику тени. Правда это или нет — неизвестно, но из сотен людей, пытавшихся войти в древний корабль, до сих пор живым не вернулся никто.

Since then, there have been incessant pilgrimages in search of Salis Prime. Legend has it that the renowned Argenta wanders the ancient ship, awaiting the hero of purest heart to whom she will bestow the One Star, and mercilessly slaying those in whom she detects even a sliver of darkness. No one knows whether the legend is true, yet of the thousands who have tried to enter the ancient ship, not one has returned alive.
languages.original_text: С тех пор паломники неустанно отправляются на поиски Салис Прайм. Легенда гласит, что прославленная Арджента бродит внутри древнего корабля, ожидая подлинно чистого духом героя, которому передаст Единственную звезду, и разя беспощадно тех, в чьей душе увидит хоть толику тени. Правда это или нет — неизвестно, но из сотен людей, пытавшихся войти в древний корабль, до сих пор живым не вернулся никто.

traits.locale_text: Since then, pilgrims incessantly embarked on expeditions to search for the Salis Prime. The legend says that the renowned Argenta wanders inside the ancient ship, waiting for the hero with the purest of hearts, to whom she will bestow the One Star, and slaying without mercy those, in whom she sees a sliver of darkness. It is unknown, whether the legend is true, yet of thousands who tried to enter the ancient ship, no one has returned alive.

Since then, pilgrims incessantly embarked on expeditions to search for the Salis Prime. The legend says that the renowned Argenta wanders inside the ancient ship, waiting for the hero with the purest of hearts, to whom she will bestow the One Star, and slaying without mercy those, in whom she sees a sliver of darkness. It is unknown, whether the legend is true, yet of thousands who tried to enter the ancient ship, no one has returned alive.

Since then, there have been incessant pilgrimages in search of Salis Prime. Legend has it that the renowned Argenta wanders the ancient ship, awaiting the hero of purest heart, to whom she will bestow the One Star, and mercilessly slaying those in whom she detects even a sliver of darkness. No one knows whether the legend is true, yet of the thousands who have tried to enter the ancient ship, not one has returned alive.

Since then, there have been incessant pilgrimages in search of Salis Prime. Legend has it that the renowned Argenta wanders the ancient ship, awaiting the hero of purest heart, to whom she will bestow the One Star, and mercilessly slaying those in whom she detects even a sliver of darkness. No one knows whether the legend is true, yet of the thousands who have tried to enter the ancient ship, not one has returned alive.

Since then, there have been incessant pilgrimages in search of Salis Prime. Legend has it that the renowned Argenta wanders the ancient ship, awaiting the hero of purest heart to whom she will bestow the One Star, and mercilessly slaying those in whom she detects even a sliver of darkness. No one knows whether the legend is true, yet of the thousands who have tried to enter the ancient ship, not one has returned alive.

Since then, there have been incessant pilgrimages in search of Salis Prime. Legend has it that the renowned Argenta wanders the ancient ship, awaiting the hero of purest heart to whom she will bestow the One Star, and mercilessly slaying those in whom she detects even a sliver of darkness. No one knows whether the legend is true, yet of the thousands who have tried to enter the ancient ship, not one has returned alive.

languages.text: 自那之后，不断有朝圣者前往萨利斯主星。传言声称，著名的阿洁塔就在那艘古老的圣船上徘徊，等待着将命运之星授给最纯洁的英雄，而那些心中哪怕有一丁点黑暗的人，都会死在她的手上。没人知道这个传说是否属实。然而，仍然有成千上万的人试图进入这艘古老的圣船，却没有任何人活着回去。
languages.original_text: Since then, there have been incessant pilgrimages in search of Salis Prime. Legend has it that the renowned Argenta wanders the ancient ship, awaiting the hero of purest heart to whom she will bestow the One Star, and mercilessly slaying those in whom she detects even a sliver of darkness. No one knows whether the legend is true, yet of the thousands who have tried to enter the ancient ship, not one has returned alive.

traits.locale_text: 自那之后，不断有朝圣者前往萨利斯主星。传言声称，著名的阿洁塔就在那艘古老的圣船上徘徊，等待着将命运之星授给最纯洁的英雄，而那些心中哪怕有一丁点黑暗的人，都会死在她的手上。没人知道这个传说是否属实。然而，仍然有成千上万的人试图进入这艘古老的圣船，却没有任何人活着回去。

languages.text: Seitdem gab es unaufhörlich Pilgerreisen, um Salis Prime zu finden. Der Legende zufolge wandert die angesehene Argenta durch das Schiff und wartet auf den Helden von reinstem Herzen, um ihm den Einen Stern zu schenken. Alle, in denen sie auch nur das kleinste bisschen Dunkelheit entdeckt, streckt sie dagegen gnadenlos nieder. Niemand weiß, ob die Legende wahr ist, doch von den tausenden von Glücksrittern, die versucht haben, das uralte Schiff zu betreten, ist nicht ein einziger lebend zurückgekehrt.
languages.original_text: Since then, there have been incessant pilgrimages in search of Salis Prime. Legend has it that the renowned Argenta wanders the ancient ship, awaiting the hero of purest heart to whom she will bestow the One Star, and mercilessly slaying those in whom she detects even a sliver of darkness. No one knows whether the legend is true, yet of the thousands who have tried to enter the ancient ship, not one has returned alive.

traits.locale_text: Seitdem gab es unaufhörlich Pilgerreisen, um Salis Prime zu finden. Der Legende zufolge wandert die angesehene Argenta durch das Schiff und wartet auf den Helden von reinstem Herzen, um ihm den Einen Stern zu schenken. Alle, in denen sie auch nur das kleinste bisschen Dunkelheit entdeckt, streckt sie dagegen gnadenlos nieder. Niemand weiß, ob die Legende wahr ist, doch von den tausenden von Glücksrittern, die versucht haben, das uralte Schiff zu betreten, ist nicht ein einziger lebend zurückgekehrt.

languages.text: Depuis, des pèlerinages partent continuellement à la recherche de Salis Primus. Selon la légende, la célèbre Argenta erre à bord du vaisseau en attendant le héros au cœur le plus pur, à qui elle accordera l'Étoile unique, et abat sans pitié quiconque porte en lui ne serait-ce qu'une once de ténèbres. Nul ne sait si cette histoire vraie, mais aucun des milliers d'aventuriers qui ont essayé de pénétrer à bord du vaisseau n'en est revenu.
languages.original_text: Since then, there have been incessant pilgrimages in search of Salis Prime. Legend has it that the renowned Argenta wanders the ancient ship, awaiting the hero of purest heart to whom she will bestow the One Star, and mercilessly slaying those in whom she detects even a sliver of darkness. No one knows whether the legend is true, yet of the thousands who have tried to enter the ancient ship, not one has returned alive.

traits.locale_text: Depuis, des pèlerinages partent continuellement à la recherche de Salis Primus. Selon la légende, la célèbre Argenta erre à bord du vaisseau en attendant le héros au cœur le plus pur, à qui elle accordera l'Étoile unique, et abat sans pitié quiconque porte en lui ne serait-ce qu'une once de ténèbres. Nul ne sait si cette histoire vraie, mais aucun des milliers d'aventuriers qui ont essayé de pénétrer à bord du vaisseau n’en est revenu.

languages.text: Desde entonces, se han sucedido los peregrinajes en busca de Salis Prime. Según la leyenda, la famosa Argenta se halla en la antigua nave, esperando al héroe de corazón puro al que entregará la Estrella Única y abatiendo a todos los que presentan un ápice de oscuridad. Nadie sabe si la leyenda es cierta, pero, de los miles de valientes que han intentado entrar en la nave, ninguno ha regresado con vida.
languages.original_text: Since then, there have been incessant pilgrimages in search of Salis Prime. Legend has it that the renowned Argenta wanders the ancient ship, awaiting the hero of purest heart to whom she will bestow the One Star, and mercilessly slaying those in whom she detects even a sliver of darkness. No one knows whether the legend is true, yet of the thousands who have tried to enter the ancient ship, not one has returned alive.

traits.locale_text: Desde entonces, se han sucedido los peregrinajes en busca de Salis Prime. Según la leyenda, la famosa Argenta se halla en la antigua nave, esperando al héroe de corazón puro al que entregará la Estrella Única y abatiendo a todos los que presentan un ápice de oscuridad. Nadie sabe si la leyenda es cierta, pero, de los miles de valientes que han intentado entrar en la nave, ninguno ha regresado con vida.

languages.text: それ以来、サリス・プライムを求めて絶え間ない巡礼が続いている。伝説によると、高名なアルジェンタが古代の船をさまよい、純粋な心を持つ英雄を待ち続け、その英雄には「一つの星」を授け、そして、一片の闇でも感じ取った者は容赦なく殺すという。その伝説が真実かどうかは誰にもわからない。しかし、古代の船に入ろうとした幾千人のうち、生きて戻った者は一人もいない。
languages.original_text: Since then, there have been incessant pilgrimages in search of Salis Prime. Legend has it that the renowned Argenta wanders the ancient ship, awaiting the hero of purest heart to whom she will bestow the One Star, and mercilessly slaying those in whom she detects even a sliver of darkness. No one knows whether the legend is true, yet of the thousands who have tried to enter the ancient ship, not one has returned alive.

traits.locale_text: それ以来、サリス・プライムを求めて絶え間ない巡礼が続いている。伝説によると、高名なアルジェンタが古代の船をさまよい、純粋な心を持つ英雄を待ち続け、その英雄には「一つの星」を授け、そして、一片の闇でも感じ取った者は容赦なく殺すという。その伝説が真実かどうかは誰にもわからない。しかし、古代の船に入ろうとした幾千人のうち、生きて戻った者は一人もいない。

languages.text: O günden beri sürekli olarak Salis Prime'ı arayan yeni seyyahlar ortaya çıkmaya başladı. Efsanelere göre şanlı Argenta kadim gemide dolanmakta, Emsalsiz Yıldız'ı bahşedeceği saf yürekli bir kahramanın onu bulmasını beklemekte ve içinde en ufak bir karanlık gördüğü herkesi acımasızca katletmekteymiş. Efsanenin gerçek olup olmadığını kimse bilmiyor ancak kadim gemiye girmeye çalışan binlercesi arasından geriye dönebilen tek bir kişi bile olmadı.
languages.original_text: Since then, there have been incessant pilgrimages in search of Salis Prime. Legend has it that the renowned Argenta wanders the ancient ship, awaiting the hero of purest heart to whom she will bestow the One Star, and mercilessly slaying those in whom she detects even a sliver of darkness. No one knows whether the legend is true, yet of the thousands who have tried to enter the ancient ship, not one has returned alive.
